title: Eco Kitchen sponge - Loofah
subTitle: A sustainable eco-friendly alternative to the classic sponge in the kitchen

marketingArguments.title: The advantage of loofah sponge
marketingArguments.speech: This sponge is created from a plant called Loofah. Loofah is an easy, renewable resource, which is a fast-growing. They donâ€™t require much processing other than drying, making it a real eco-friendly choice for your kitchen.

marketingArguments.title: Biodegradable
marketingArguments.speech: At the end of its use, it can simply be added to your home compost.

marketingArguments.title: Sustainable
marketingArguments.speech: Each sponge is made to last 3 to 4 weeks, based on daily use. So this kit should be enough for 2 to 3 months.

marketingArguments.title: Multi-use
marketingArguments.speech: Loofah sponge could be used to wash dishes and clean the kitchen. The loofah helps for dishwashing as it will capture any oily substances.
